pl.edu.agh.icsr.janet.util
Class LongWrapper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pl.edu.agh.icsr.janet.util.LongWrapper
public class LongWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Mutable wrapper for long value. Since it is mutable, it may be used for passing long values by reference (unlike java.lang.Long).

Field Summary
 long val
          wrapped, mutable long value.
 
Constructor Summary
LongWrapper()
          Constructs a new wrapper with a zero value.

          Constructs a new wrapper with given value.
